textBox.richText: Lots of changes are going on around here! iWeb Buddy has finally been approved for release via the Mac App Store. This has a few impacts: 1. Anyone who is interested in purchasing iWeb Buddy can now download it directly from the Mac App Store. 2. iWeb Buddy has been renamed to “Buddy for iWeb”. While this is unfortunate it is required by Apple to be in the Mac App Store. 3. We will no longer be offering iWeb Buddy for purchase directly from our website. As always, if you run into any issues with this release, please let us know. Changes since last build: • Fixed a crashing bug when trying to retrieve page thumbnail images. • This is probably the last release to support OS X 10.5 unless major bugs are discovered. If you are an existing owner of iWeb Buddy then you can receive this latest update by checking for updates from within iWeb Buddy. If you are new to iWeb Buddy, you can receive this update by downloading it from the Mac App Store. Please enjoy this release of iWeb Buddy and report any issues you may find on our new support forum at http://help.zarrastudios.com.
